title: Candles (Non-Toxic/Vegan) Glow In The Dark & UV Activated with crystal
description: Non-toxic, vegan, phthalate free art candles made with coconut wax & a crackling wooden wick. Each candle top is a work of art featuring a D ring on the back of the candle top so that you can hang the candle top on the wall once all the wax has burnt out.
